mapper.sql: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, M.USER_ID, B.BOARD_WRITER_NO, M.USER_NAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, B.BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS, M.MEMBER_IMAGE, D.DEPT_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(M.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND B.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, R.REPLY_NO, M.USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, R.REPLY_WRITER_NO, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_CREATE_DATE, R.STATUS, M.MEMBER_IMAGE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.REPLY_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON(R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}

SELECT R.REPLY_NO, R.BOARD_NO, R.REPLY_WRITER_NO, M.USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.STATUS, R.REPLY_CREATE_DATE, R.REPLY_MODIFY_DATE, M.MEMBER_IMAGE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = R.REPLY_WRITER_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON(B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO) WHERE R.STATUS='Y' AND R.REPLY_NO=#{replyNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, M.USER_ID AS B_USER_ID, M.USER_NAME AS B_USER_NAME, B.BOARD_WRITER_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, B.BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS AS B_STATUS, M.MEMBER_IMAGE AS B_MEMBER_IMAGE, D.DEPT_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND ROWNUM < = 2
AND (M.USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriterNo}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_CONTENT=#{boardContent}, BOARD_MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS='N' WHERE BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{user_no}, #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT=#{replyContent}, REPLY_MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE REPLY_NO=#{replyNo}
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS='N' WHERE REPLY_NO=#{replyNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, M.USER_ID AS B_USER_ID, M.USER_NAME AS B_USER_NAME, B.BOARD_WRITER_NO, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, B.BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS AS B_STATUS, M.MEMBER_IMAGE AS B_MEMBER_IMAGE, D.DEPT_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE B.BOARD_NO < = #{board.No} AND B.BOARD_NO > #{board.No}-2
AND (M.USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
